name: Ghouls Underground for PC and NES
name_original: Ghouls Underground for PC and NES
description:
BREAKING NEW:

Try my last game MORTAL RACER on itch.io by clicking on the link below

https://choloco.itch.io/mortal-racer

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

A Huge Metroidvania/Shoot-em-up in the Underworld!

Lead a team of heroes to destroy evil in a dangerous labyrinth full of various enemies and traps. A lot of treasures and weapons to find!

Warning this is not a simply shoot em up but a metroidvania too, so you need to find specific items to open specific ways.
